entry.title: WIND WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 07:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: E 83 km/h gust 97 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers this morning. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 110 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with rain showers or flurries. Rainfall amount 2 mm except snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 07:36 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
